price: Na ukelele uliwaangamiza wale walio dhulumu, wakapambazukiwa nao ni maiti majumbani mwao.
arabic: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
footnotes: Ukelele uliwatwaa kina Thamud kwa nguvu zake, na tetemeko lake, na ngurumo lake, kwa kuwa hao walijidhulumu wenyewe kwa ukafiri wao na uadui. Kulipo pambazuka wakawa katika majumba yao kimya, wamejinyoosha kifudifudi, maiti, hawatweti!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-akhadha alladhīna ẓalamū al-ṣayḥatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāthimīna
